_meta.purpose: k-Ï‰ channel flow - NONDIMENSIONAL at Re_tau=590
_meta.notes: Pseudo-transient to steady state with adaptive dt

geom._comment_y_first: First cell height. y+ = y_first * Re_tau = 0.002 * 590 = 1.18. Low-Re wall BC requires y+ < 2.5.
geom._comment_growth_rate: Geometric stretching from wall. Set 1.0 for uniform mesh.

turb._comment_omega_min: Floor on omega to prevent nu_t runaway. omega_min=10 best for U+, lower values improve k+ but over-damp velocity.
turb._comment_C_lim: Durbin realizability: nu_t <= C_lim*k/(sqrt(6)*|S|). Set 0 to disable. Typical value: 0.6

solve._comment_under_relax: k/omega use under_relax_k_omega, nu_t uses under_relax_nu_t (more aggressive damping)
